content: [emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You reach an enormous open area in the caves, the walls illuminated by sea-flora. Cyrina stops swimming to gracefully float in the water next to you...

[sound:giggle02|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“This is where mother and I live! Let me go get her!” She gives your hand a squeeze before darting off into one of the passageways.
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:false]You feel your heart rate quicken, a sinking feeling in your stomach.

[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]Just when you thought the worst was going to happen. The soft and comforting tune began to fill the cave. Cyrina swims back holding something in her hands.
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]She places the shimmering tear-shaped gem into your hand. “My mother’s final tear drop before the sea-witch transformed her into…”
[emotion:blush|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]The entire cave rumbles as massive tentacles move through the passageways, reaching out for both of you.
[sound:giggle03|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]The end of one tentacle gives Cyrina a motherly embrace, while another pats you on the top of your head.

[sound:giggle01|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true] “She likes you! I’m so happy!” She swims in a playful loop around you. She then stops in front of you and places a kiss onto your visor..
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You laugh nervously. Cyrina takes your hand. “Come on! We have so much more to explore together!”
